### A manga reader with an integrated OCR dictionary and other language learning features
[![](https://img.shields.io/badge/gengo.app-%23fff?style=for-the-badge&logo=data%3Aimage%2Fsvg%2Bxml%3Bbase64%2CPD94bWwgdmVyc2lvbj0iMS4wIiBlbmNvZGluZz0idXRmLTgiPz4KPHN2ZyB2aWV3Qm94PSIwIDAgODAgODAiIHhtbG5zPSJodHRwOi8vd3d3LnczLm9yZy8yMDAwL3N2ZyI%%2B)](https://gengo.app)
